definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Objective To improve the TLC identification of Unguentum tetracycline.
sentences.chinese: 目的对四环素软膏薄层色谱鉴别法进行改进。

sentences.english: There were no serious side effects from minocycline.
sentences.chinese: 二甲胺四环素并没有严重的副作用。

sentences.english: Is permanent, but now no longer a tetracycline .
sentences.chinese: 四环素牙是永久性的，但是现在已不用四环素了。

sentences.english: Is permanent, but now no longer a tetracycline .
sentences.chinese: 四环素牙是永久性的，但是现在已不用四环素了。

sentences.english: Coexisting tetracycline and anhydrochlorotetracycline do not interfere with the determination of chlorotetracycline.
sentences.chinese: 共存四环素和脱水金霉素杂质不干扰金霉素测定。

sentences.english: Drugs from the tetracycline family are the most commonly prescribed antibiotics for the treatment of severe acne.
sentences.chinese: 治疗严重粉刺最常用的是四环素类抗生素。

sentences.english: It is regrettable that minocycline are still not completely remove the virus.
sentences.chinese: 但遗憾的是二甲胺四环素人仍不能完全去除病毒。

sentences.english: Oral tetracyclines will minimize the risk of infection.
sentences.chinese: 口服四环素可以降低感染的风险。

sentences.english: That will likely be true of minocycline.
sentences.chinese: 这才是真实的二甲胺四环素。

sentences.english: All cases were cured after treated with chloramphenicolum or tetracycline tablets and supportive liver protection therapy.
sentences.chinese: 所有患者经氯霉素或四环素类片剂及保肝治疗均痊愈。

sentences.english: Tribological properties of tetracycline stained teeth are found to be correlative with its color.
sentences.chinese: 四环素牙的摩擦学特性与其变色程度相关。

sentences.english: The drug latches onto calcium and gets deposited in bone.
sentences.chinese: 四环素类药物会与钙螯合，沉积在骨骼中。
与四环素有密切的交叉耐药性。

definition: quinolone (a hydroxylated quinoline, inhibiting the replication of bacterial DNA)
